This place serves 20+ pizzas by the slice, empanadas and desserts.  They are cash only.  The pizzas are very tasty, and there are several vegetarian options.  You order by walking up to the pizza / empanadas case, then queueing separately for drinks. The employees understand English well but prefer Spanish.  They were very helpful and yet direct.  The prices are very reasonable, about 2 euro a slice.   Slices are medium thick crust, so two slices was plenty of food.  Sodas and beers were also inexpensive.  The desserts looked great, but I was already full of pizza.  The pesto slice, jamon con aceitunas, and champignons all received rave reviews at our table.
